GM North America President Mark Reuss and Chrysler's Sergio Marchionne all promise not to fall back into the trap of making too many cars and then slapping huge discounts on the vehicles to move metal off dealer lots. This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit, said Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat, the Italian auto company. purchase 17 self-contained breathing apparatuses, U.S. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand announced today. The new breathing apparatuses will replace the fire company's 13-year-old air packs, and increase the overall safety of Mottville's 35 volunteer firefighters. It's going to help keep all the firefighters safe so they can enter burning buildings with the latest technology in air packs, Mottville volunteer Fire Chief Tim Baker said. Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
